sentences.sContent: Much later he collaborated with his son Michael on the English translation of a text on food production.
sentences.sCn: 后来他和儿子迈克尔合作，把一个有关食品生产的文本翻译成英语。

remMethod.val: col(一起， 共同) + labor(工作) + ate → 协作， 合作

words.tran: [劳经] 合作者；勾结者；通敌者

trans.tranCn: 协作， 合作； 勾结， 通敌
trans.tranOther: to work together with a person or group in order to achieve something, especially in science or art
